programme.title: Road to Glory - Aquatics
programme.desc: The best diving, swimming and water polo stories from throughout Olympic history including Dawn Fraser, Greg Louganis and Michael Phelps.

programme.title: Road to Glory - Athletics - The Marathon
programme.desc: The best moments from the Olympic Games’ ultimate endurance events with stories from Emil Zatopek and Frank Shorter.

programme.title: Strangest Moments | Episode 1
programme.desc: In this episode: a crazy marathon race, the Greg Louganis story, a false start disaster, why everyone loves Derek Redmond, and the forgotten Olympics.

programme.title: Group All-Around Final | Rhythmic Gymnastics | Olympic Games Paris 2024
programme.desc: This session includes the Group All-Around Final which took place at the Porte de La Chapelle Arena, France, on the 10/08/24. The People´s Republic of China claimed Gold, Israel took Silver and Italy completed the podium.

programme.title: Can NBA and Dream Team star Laettner teach this team to win?
programme.desc: Team USA and NBA legend Christian Laettner shows the Garinger High School varsity basketball team how they can improve their game.

programme.title: Olympic Outposts - Episode 3: A global journey to discover sports passions in the most unlikely places.
programme.desc: Journey to the opposite ends of the world as our hosts explore the Senegalese wrestling mashup style, Jamaica’s rugby developing scene or Break dance tradition in South Korea.

programme.title: Mat B: Men's & Women's Freestyle - Day 14 - Evening | Wrestling | Olympic Games Paris 2024
programme.desc: This session includes the Men's Freestyle 74kg and 125kg Semifinals and Freestyle 57kg and 86kg Finals. Rei Higuchi (JPN) won the Gold Medal Freestyle 57kg and Magomed Eldarovitch Ramazanov (BUL) won the Gold Medal Freestyle 86kg. As well as the Women's Freestyle 62kg Semifinals and Freestyle 57kg Finals. Tsugumi Sakurai (JPN) won the Gold Medal Freestyle 57kg.

programme.title: Olympic Outposts - Episode 3: A global journey to discover sports passions in the most unlikely places.
programme.desc: Journey to the opposite ends of the world as our hosts explore the Senegalese wrestling mashup style, Jamaica’s rugby developing scene or Break dance tradition in South Korea.

programme.title: Russia’s Aleksandr Karelin (extended)
programme.desc: Three-time Olympic champion Aleksandr Karelin now has the Kremlin as the ultimate goal, having swapped the sporting arena for politics

programme.title: Women's Boulder & Lead Finals | Sport Climbing | Olympic Games Paris 2024
programme.desc: The Women's Boulder & Lead Finals took place at Le Bourget Climbing Venue, France, on 10/08/2024. Janja Garnbret (SLO) won the Gold with a total of 168.5 points. Brooke Raboutou (USA) won the Silver and Jessica Pilz (AUT) completed the podium.

programme.title: Gamers Vs: Episode 4
programme.desc: Popular Gamers apply their gaming skills to Olympic sports with the help of world-class athletes and international coaches but how does it apply to the sports of Climbing, Dressage and Karate.

programme.title: Women's -67kg & Men's -80kg Repechages/Finals | Taekwondo | Olympic Games Paris 2024
programme.desc:
This session includes the Women's -67kg & Men's -80kg Repechages/Finals which took place at the Grand Palais on 09/08/24.
The Women's -67Kg was won by Viviana Marton (HUN) with Gold, Aleksandra Perisic (SRB) with Silver and a tie in Bronze by Kristina Teachout (USA) and Sarah Chaari (BEL).
The Men's -80kg was won by Firas Katoussi (TUN) with Gold, Mehran Barkhordari (IRI) with Silver and Bronze for Simone Alessio (ITA) and Edi Hrnic (DEN).

programme.title: Women's -57kg & Men's -68kg Repechages/Finals | Taekwondo | Olympic Games Paris 2024
programme.desc:
This session includes the Women's -57kg & Men's -68kg Repechages/Finals which took place at the Grand Palais on 08/08/24.
The Women's -57Kg was won by Yujin Kim (KOR) with Gold, Nahid Kiyanichandeh (IRI) with Silver and a tie in Bronze by Skylar Park (CAN) and Alizadeh Kimia (BUL).
The Men's -68kg was won by Ulugbek Rashitov (UZB) with Gold, Zaid Kareem (JOR) with Silver and Bronze for Yushuai Liang (CHN) and Edival Pontes (BRA).

programme.title: The Tech Race | Episode 1
programme.desc: In this episode: carbon fiber pole vaults, oxygen volume tests, synchro swimming cameras, taekwondo wireless scoring systems, and cross bike dampers.

programme.title: Men's Final | Triathlon | Olympic Games Paris 2024
programme.desc:
The Men's Triathlon Final took place on day five of the Olympic Games Paris 2024 at Pont Alexandre III on July 31, 2024 in Paris, France.
Alex Yee (GBR) won Gold, Hayden Wilde (NZL) won Silver and Leo Bergere (FRA) won Bronze.

programme.title: Meet the entourage of Shibutani Siblings, Fabian Gomez and Mohamed Lahna
programme.desc: Maia Shibutani (USA) x Big brother Alex Shibutani; Fabian Gomez (ARG) x Caddie Coco Monteros; Mohamed Lahna (MAR) x Advocate Alan Shanken

programme.title: Mixed Relay Final | Triathlon | Olympic Games Paris 2024
programme.desc: The Mixed Relay Triathlon Final took place at Pont Alexandre III on August 5, 2024 in Paris, France. Germany claimed Gold, United States Silver, and Great Britain completed the podium.

programme.title: The Olympics On The Record | Episode 6
programme.desc: A new Trinidad star throws himself into the record books, Killy leaves his mark, oldest Olympians, and Kenyan Steeplechase dominance.

programme.title: Can Jackie Silva get this Brazilian volleyball team to defeat their rival?
programme.desc: Brazilian Olympic gold medalist Jackie Silva lends her expertise to a Rio indoor volleyball team as they try to win their first event ever.

programme.title: Women's 71kg | Weightlifting | Olympic Games Paris 2024
programme.desc: The Weightlifting Women's 71kg took place at the South Paris Arena 6 on 09/08/24. Olivia Reeves (USA) won the Gold medal, Mari Leivis Sanchez (COL) won the Silver medal and the Bronze medal was for Angie Paola Palacios Dajomes (ECU).

programme.title: The Tech Race | Episode 1
programme.desc: In this episode: carbon fiber pole vaults, oxygen volume tests, synchro swimming cameras, taekwondo wireless scoring systems, and cross bike dampers.

programme.title: The Tech Race | Episode 2
programme.desc: In this episode: golf swing mastering technology, running prosthetics, smart force weightlifting platforms, rowing power sensors, and ski airbags.

programme.title: Women's -49kg & Men's -58kg Repechages/Finals | Taekwondo | Olympic Games Paris 2024
programme.desc:
This session includes the Women's -49kg & Men's -58kg Repechages/Finals which took place at the Grand Palais on 07/08/24.
The Women's -49Kg was won by Panipak Wongpattanakit (THA) with Gold, Qing Guo (CHN) with Silver and a tie in Bronze by Mobina Nematzadeh (IRI) and Lena Stojkovic (CRO).
The Men's -58kg was won by Taejoon Park (KOR) with Gold, Gashim Magomedov (AZE) with Silver and Bronze for Cyrian Ravet (FRA) and Mohamed Jendoubi (TUN).

programme.title: Ariarne Titmus: Splashing into swimming royalty | Wait For It Tokyo 2020
programme.desc: How Ariarne Titmus went from chasing gold to being the one to beat after nail bitter 200m and 400m freestyle victories in Tokyo2020

programme.title: How Jordan’s Olympic medal turned Ahmad Abughaush into an icon
programme.desc: When Ahmad Abughaush won Jordan’s first-ever Olympic gold medal in 2016, he instantly became an icon for his fellow countrymen.

programme.title: Men's 200m Individual Medley - Final | Swimming | Olympic Games Paris 2024
programme.desc: The Men's 200m Individual Medley was held at Paris La Defense Arena, on 02/08/2024. Leon Marchand (FRA) claimed Gold with a new Olympic Record time 1:54.06, Duncan Scott (GBR) took Silver and Wang Shun (CHN) completed the podium.

programme.title: Men's 100m Butterfly - Final | Swimming | Olympic Games Paris 2024
programme.desc: The Men's 100m Butterfly was held at Paris La Defense Arena, on 03/08/2024. Kristof Milak (HUN) claimed Gold with a time of 49.90 seconds, Josh Liendo (CAN) took Silver and Ilya Kharun (CAN) completed the podium.

programme.title: Women's 200m Individual Medley - Final | Swimming | Olympic Games Paris 2024
programme.desc: The Women's 200m Individual Medley was held at Paris La Defense Arena, on 03/08/2024. Summer McIntosh (CAN) claimed Gold with a new Olympic Record time of 2:06.56, Kate Douglass (USA) took Silver and Kaylee McKeown (AUS) completed the podium.

programme.title: Men's 4x100m Medley Relay - Final | Swimming | Olympic Games Paris 2024
programme.desc: The Men's 4x100m Medley Relay was held at Paris La Defense Arena, on 04/08/2024. The People's Republic of China claimed Gold with a time of 3:27.46min, The United States of America took Silver and France completed the podium.

programme.title: Women's 4x100m Medley Relay - Final | Swimming | Olympic Games Paris 2024
programme.desc: The Women's 4x100m Medley Relay was held at Paris La Defense Arena, on 04/08/2024. The United States of America claimed Gold with a World Record time of 3:49.63, Australia took Silver and The People's Republic of China completed the podium.

programme.title: On the Line: Swimming
programme.desc: Discovering other names, stories and anecdotes behind the mythical Olympic Finals of swimming

programme.title: Women's 81kg | Weightlifting | Olympic Games Paris 2024
programme.desc: This session includes the Women's 81kg which took place at the South Paris Arena 6, France, on the 10/08/24. Solfrid Eila Amena Koanda (NOR) claimed Gold, Sara Ahmed (EGY) took Silver and Neisi Patricia Dajomes Barrera (ECU) completed the podium.

programme.title: BRA-TUR - Women's Bronze Medal Match | Volleyball | Olympic Games Paris 2024
programme.desc: The Women's Bronze Medal Match took place at South Paris Arena 1, Paris, on 10/08/2024. Brazil won Bronze with a final score BRA 3:1 TUR.

programme.title: Men's Classification & Bronze Medal Match | Water Polo | Olympic Games Paris 2024
programme.desc: This session contains the Men's Classification & Bronze Medal Match. It took place on 11/08/2024 at La Defense Arena, Paris.

programme.title: How water polo MVP Ashleigh Johnson smashed stereotypes
programme.desc: Not only was Johnson the first ever African American woman to compete for Team USA in water polo, she was crowned tournament MVP in Rio.

programme.title: Meet Croatia’s first family of water polo
programme.desc: Yugoslavia was a dominant force in water polo, and the Bukic family from Croatia has been at the heart of it. The father Perica won three Olympic medals. Now his son Luka is carrying on the family legacy by winning silver at Rio 2016.

programme.title: Women's Pole Vault Final | Athletics | Olympic Games Paris 2024
programme.desc: The Women's Pole Vault Final took place at the Stade de France, France, on 07/08/24. Nina Kennedy (AUS) won Gold with a height of 4.90m. Katie Moon (USA) claimed Silver, and Alysha Newman (CAN) completed the podium.
